page.title: 03A SACRISTON GIRL'S WEEKEND
page.content: I get up at about 8:30 if I am going to Durham with my mum. If not I get up at about 9:15. I have my breakfast; then do my homework or some sewing. Every other Saturday afternoon, I go to a wind band where I play my clarinet for 2\ hours. Otherwise I do the same as I did in the morning. I have my tea about 5:45 then wait anxiously for "Dynasty". I go to bed about 10:30pm. { }Sunday. I get up about 9:15. We leave for church at 10:15 and arrive home about 12:10 and we have the dinner. Afterwards I do my homework or go out with my family for the beginning of the afternoon, then about 4:00 we go to see my Grandparents. We have tea and I do my piano practice, then not much else until "That's Life". After that I go to bed.
